body_html: The current implementation is pretty specialized to float32, so it wouldn't be completely trivial to switch it over. However, we'd be glad to take contributions on this if it would be useful.
body_text: The current implementation is pretty specialized to float32, so it wouldn't be completely trivial to switch it over. However, we'd be glad to take contributions on this if it would be useful.
body: The current implementation is pretty specialized to `float32`, so it wouldn't be completely trivial to switch it over. However, we'd be glad to take contributions on this if it would be useful.
